Senior Full Stack Developer - TechCorp Inc.

About the Role:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to join our innovative team. You will work on building scalable, high-performance applications using modern technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and implement full-stack web applications
- Develop REST APIs and backend services
- Optimize application performance and user experience
- Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers
- Participate in Agile ceremonies and sprint planning
- Ensure code quality and implement CI/CD pipelines

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of professional software development experience
- Strong proficiency in React and JavaScript/TypeScript
- Experience with Node.js and Express backend development
- Database design and optimization (MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
- Familiarity with Docker and containerization
- Experience with AWS or similar cloud platforms
- Strong understanding of RESTful API design
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

Nice to Have:
- Experience with GraphQL
- Kubernetes orchestration knowledge
- Machine Learning basics
- Experience with Python or Go
- Open source contributions

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and equity
- Health insurance
- 401(k) matching
- Remote work opportunities
- Professional development budget
